name: Six Now, Forever and Ever
description:
──⇌••⇋──
Use arrow keys to move and progress
(Or swipe on mobile)
Not too sure how I feel about this one, but it's out here now!
It's not really that spooky of a game, but it was fun to make!
──⇌••⇋──
Made with bitsy (and borksy) for the public domain bitsy jam,
using these poems from "Now I Am Six" by A. A. Milne:
- The Charcoal Burner
- The End
- Binker
All now in the public domain,
and surprisingly spooky-sounding!
──⇌••⇋──
Track "Insanity" by TheRealSwirls
